channel.title: Which base?
channel.description:
Now i dont know exactly if this is the right section for this, but ive decided to move on from delta, pi and all those other bases with everything already in for you, ive decided to try and start on my own server, kind of, from one of the base servers provided, which one do you guys think would be the best selection and why? http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427654.0.html
Right now, im leaning toward hyperion, because of the stability.

item.title: Which base?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=474776.msg3472553#msg3472553 date=1295397919]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=474776.msg3472507#msg3472507 date=1295396094]

I will be the first to say.

“Why does it matter you will just leech” or “You will just load it full of tutorials only”.

well lets see… no tutorials on most of these bases… how exactly would i do this? im not aloud to go forward?
i want to do something other than a stupid wL… and i want to do it myself… everyones always complaining about people leeching and using tuts for everything
[/quote]Not sure about this, but I think if you read up on Java, you won’t need tutorials or leeched code.

Just a wild guess though.

well thats exactly my point…
[/quote]Then your “no tutorials on most of these bases…” is not valid. If you study the code, you will understand what it does.[/quote]

thats what i meant, forgot to delete the beginning.
I meant there aren’t tutorials on most of these bases (not any Ive seen) what i was saying then how would i fill it with tutorials if there are a few if none of them?
And how would i leech them? They are basically empty bases for construction, unless Ive got this whole thing wrong…

study the code, you will understand what it does.
Thats exactly what i planned on doing :D

Read full topic

item.title: Which base?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:5, topic:378916”]Hyperion obviously. I’m also surprised that you couldn’t find this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427654.0.html :rolleyes:

I hope you know what you’re doing. This is no folder consisting of 5-10 classes with horrible code and a run.bat…[/quote]
yes im pretty sure i know its more than a delta lol.

For now ill just try runesource, see how that works, thanks scape-java.

Read full topic
